member.name: IDXGIDevice4.OfferResources1
member.summary: Allows the operating system to free the video memory of resources, including both discarding the content and de-committing the memory.
member.param: The number of resources in the ppResources argument array.
An array of pointers to interfaces for the resources to offer.
A -typed value that indicates how valuable data is.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code, which can include E_INVALIDARG if a resource in the array, or the priority, is invalid.

member.name: IDXGIDevice4.ReclaimResources1
member.summary: Restores access to resources that were previously offered by calling .
member.param: The number of resources in the ppResources argument and pResults argument arrays.
An array of pointers to interfaces for the resources to reclaim.

A pointer to an array that receives values. Each value in the array corresponds to a resource at the same index that the ppResources parameter specifies. The caller can pass in NULL, if the caller intends to fill the resources with new content regardless of whether the old content was discarded.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code, including E_INVALIDARG if the resources are invalid.

member.name: IDXGIDevice4
member.summary: This interface provides updated methods to offer and reclaim resources.
